```{r}
require('pracma')
```


Give the parametric solution to $A x = b$ if 
$$
A=\left[
\begin{array}{ccccc}
 1 & 1 & 1 & -1  \\
 1 & 0 & 3 & -1  \\
 -1 & 1 & -5 & 1  \\
 1 & 2 & -1 & 1  \\
\end{array}
\right] \qquad \hbox{and}\qquad  b = \begin{bmatrix} 2 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ 4 \end{bmatrix}. \hskip.5in
$$
```{r}
A = cbind(c(1,1,-1,1),c(1,0,1,2),c(1,3,-5,-1),c(2,4,-6,4))
b = c(2,4,-6,4)
Ab = cbind(A,b)
A
Ab
rref(Ab)
```
